page.title: 03Amrana's family's religion
page.content: We are six in our family, mother, father, two sisters and one brother. My father works at Maple Mill, a cotton wool factory on Oldham. Mother works in a knitwear factory which is also in Oldham. My sister, me, and my brother go to Fitton Hill School, and my younger sister is at the Juniors. This year, a month in May and June is a special month for muslims. It is the month of Ramadan. We fast for 30 days from dawn to sunset, breakfast at 2am and dinner at 10pm! Then we have Eid, our Christmas. We are given new clothes and money. Relatives visit our house and enjoy themselves. We have a great time over Eid and the funny thing about it is that we get two Christmases each year!
